name: Lightweight Better Sweater Shelled Fleece Jacket - Men's

features: 100% recycled polyester fleece body with a sweater-knit face and a brushed back; 87% recycled polyester, 13% spandex plain-weave yoke with four-way stretch and a DWR(durable water repellent)finish
Zips to the chin for warmth and protection against the elements

Reinforced shoulder yoke made of a limber blend of 87% recycled polyester and 13% spandex provides four-way stretch and protection from pack straps and shoulder bags; it has a DWR(durable water repellent)finish to stop moisture and increase abrasion resistance
Zippered handwarmer pockets; vertical, left-chest zippered security pocket
Spandex binding at cuffs and collar seals in warm air and rests comfortably on the skin
Fair Trade Certified™ sewn, which means the people who made it earned a premium for their labor
